sourcesContent:
export const mockProducts = [
  {
    id: 1,
    name: "Google Pixel 9 Pro",
    price: 1099,
    category: "electronics",
    image: "https://store.google.com/product-images/pixel-9-pro.jpg",
    description:
      "Flagship Android with Google Tensor G4, advanced AI camera, and 7-year updates",
  },
  {
    id: 2,
    name: "OnePlus 12",
    price: 899,
    category: "electronics",
    image: "https://cdn.oneplus.com/product-images/oneplus-12.jpg",
    description:
      "High-performance smartphone with Snapdragon 8 Gen 3 and 150W fast charging",
  },
  {
    id: 3,
    name: "Dell XPS 15 OLED",
    price: 2499,
    category: "electronics",
    image: "https://i.dell.com/images/xps-15-oled.jpg",
    description:
      "Premium laptop with OLED 4K display, RTX graphics, and ultra-slim design",
  },
  {
    id: 4,
    name: "Nike Air Force 1 Low",
    price: 120,
    category: "shoes",
    image: "https://static.nike.com/air-force-1-low.jpg",
    description:
      "Classic low-top sneakers with leather upper and responsive cushioning",
  },
  {
    id: 5,
    name: "Adidas Yeezy Boost 350 V2",
    price: 220,
    category: "shoes",
    image: "https://assets.adidas.com/yeezy-boost-350-v2.jpg",
    description: "Stylish sneakers with Boost cushioning and Primeknit upper",
  },
  {
    id: 6,
    name: "Uniqlo U Oversized T-Shirt",
    price: 19,
    category: "clothing",
    image: "https://image.uniqlo.com/oversized-tshirt.jpg",
    description: "Soft cotton oversized tee designed by Christophe Lemaire",
  },
  {
    id: 7,
    name: "Lululemon ABC Jogger",
    price: 128,
    category: "clothing",
    image: "https://shop.lululemon.com/abc-jogger.jpg",
    description:
      "Comfortable athletic joggers with sweat-wicking fabric and modern fit",
  },
  {
    id: 8,
    name: "Bose QuietComfort Ultra Earbuds",
    price: 299,
    category: "electronics",
    image: "https://assets.bose.com/qc-ultra-earbuds.jpg",
    description:
      "Noise-cancelling earbuds with immersive audio and all-day comfort",
  },
  {
    id: 9,
    name: "Nintendo Switch OLED",
    price: 349,
    category: "electronics",
    image: "https://assets.nintendo.com/switch-oled.jpg",
    description:
      "Hybrid gaming console with 7-inch OLED display and improved audio",
  },
  {
    id: 10,
    name: "Oakley Holbrook Sunglasses",
    price: 162,
    category: "accessories",
    image: "https://images.oakley.com/holbrook-sunglasses.jpg",
    description:
      "Timeless design sunglasses with polarized lenses for UV protection",
  },
  {
    id: 11,
    name: "Garmin Fenix 7 Pro",
    price: 799,
    category: "electronics",
    image: "https://buy.garmin.com/fenix-7-pro.jpg",
    description:
      "Multisport GPS smartwatch with solar charging and advanced training features",
  },
  {
    id: 12,
    name: "Vans Old Skool",
    price: 70,
    category: "shoes",
    image: "https://images.vans.com/old-skool.jpg",
    description: "Iconic skate shoes with suede and canvas upper",
  },
  {
    id: 13,
    name: "Sennheiser Momentum 4 Wireless",
    price: 349,
    category: "electronics",
    image: "https://assets.sennheiser.com/momentum-4.jpg",
    description: "Premium wireless headphones with adaptive noise cancellation",
  },
  {
    id: 14,
    name: "The North Face Nuptse Jacket",
    price: 320,
    category: "clothing",
    image: "https://images.thenorthface.com/nuptse-jacket.jpg",
    description:
      "Iconic insulated jacket with 700-fill down and water-resistant fabric",
  },
  {
    id: 15,
    name: "Tag Heuer Carrera Watch",
    price: 4350,
    category: "accessories",
    image: "https://tagheuer.com/carrera-watch.jpg",
    description:
      "Luxury chronograph watch with automatic movement and sapphire crystal",
  },
  {
    id: 16,
    name: "Fujifilm X-T5 Camera",
    price: 1699,
    category: "electronics",
    image: "https://fujifilm-x.com/x-t5.jpg",
    description:
      "APS-C mirrorless camera with 40MP sensor and 6.2K video recording",
  },
];

export const categories = [
  { id: "all", name: "All Products" },
  { id: "electronics", name: "Electronics" },
  { id: "shoes", name: "Shoes" },
  { id: "clothing", name: "Clothing" },
  { id: "accessories", name: "Accessories" },
];

export const priceRanges = [
  { id: "all", name: "All Prices", min: 0, max: Infinity },
  { id: "under-50", name: "Under $50", min: 0, max: 50 },
  { id: "50-150", name: "$50 - $150", min: 50, max: 150 },
  { id: "150-500", name: "$150 - $500", min: 150, max: 500 },
  { id: "500-2000", name: "$500 - $2,000", min: 500, max: 2000 },
  { id: "over-2000", name: "Over $2,000", min: 2000, max: Infinity },
];
